metadata.title: CVE-2016-3894 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: The Qualcomm DMA component in Android before 2016-09-05 on Nexus 6 devicesallows attackers to obtain sensitive information via a crafted application,aka Android internal bug 29618014 and Qualcomm internal bug CR1042033.

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
